text: The Wakarusa River is a tributary of the Kansas River. It is about long.U.S. Geological Survey. National Hydrography Dataset high-resolution flowline data. The National Map , accessed March 30, 2011 It is in eastern Kansas in the United States. It is south of Topeka and Lawrence. ==Related pages== * Bleeding Kansas Heritage Area ** California Road - Branch of the Oregon Trail to Lawrence, Kansas from Westport Landing. ** Clinton State Park - Provides recreational access to Clinton Lake. * List of Kansas rivers ** Lakes, reservoirs, and dams in Kansas ==References== Category:Rivers of Kansas Category:Bodies of water of Douglas County, Kansas
title: Wakarusa River
